New Records: Harry Kane tied with Michael Owen and Wayne Rooney as the players with the most goals for England at major tournaments with his 13th goal
Key Match Events: Morten Hjulmand scored the equalizer in the 34th minute
Harry Kane scored an early goal in the 18th minute
England substituted key players like Harry Kane, Phil Foden, and Bukayo Saka with about 20 minutes to play
Pre-Game Insights: The match got off to a slow start with poor performances from both teams
England was expected to perform better but ended up drawing
Post-Match Reflections: Harry Kane expressed frustration but remained positive
Pierre-Emile Hojbjerg felt the team should have won
Kieran Trippier addressed the fans' disappointment
Miscellaneous Highlights: Both teams had chances but failed to capitalize
Jude Bellingham barely factored into the match against Denmark's physical midfield
Denmark's supporters celebrated after the match
